entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:53 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 02:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: NE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 30 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Freezing rain or periods of snow in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. High 7. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
